titleStmt.title: The memoires of Monsieur Du Vall containing the history of his life and death. Whereunto are annexed his last speech and epitaph.
titleStmt.author: Pope, Walter, d. 1714.
Duval, Claude, 1643-1670.
Pope, William, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun near the West-End of St. Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Written by Walter Pope; also attributed to William Pope. Cf. DNB, Halkett & Laing, and Encyc. Brit. 14th ed., v. 7, p. 782.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Gun near the West-End of St. Pauls
